hero.name: Eduardo Almeida
hero.role: Full Stack Developer | Turning Ideas into Digital Solutions.
hero.bio: Specializing in creating modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications. With a passion for technology and an eye for detail, I develop everything from intuitive interfaces to robust backend systems, always focused on the best user experience and delivering value.

contactDialog.title: Get in Touch

contactDialog.yourMessagePlaceholder: Hello, I'd like to talk about...
contactDialog.successDescription: Thanks for getting in touch. I'll reply soon.
contactDialog.errorDescription: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again.

about.title: About
about.name: Eduardo Almeida
about.intro: Passionate Full Stack Developer dedicated to creating innovative digital solutions and memorable user experiences. With a keen eye for detail and a constant pursuit of learning, I transform ideas into reality through technology.
about.journey: My career is marked by dedication to building robust, scalable, and efficient web applications, utilizing best practices and the latest market technologies.
about.specialization: Specializing in front-end development with React and Next.js, and back-end with Node.js, I also have experience with databases like MongoDB and PostgreSQL, as well as DevOps tools like Docker and Git/GitHub.
about.interests: Beyond traditional development, I have a strong interest in process automation (N8N) and creating intelligent chatbots to optimize interactions and workflows.
about.philosophy: Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and staying updated with the latest industry trends. I believe collaboration and knowledge sharing are fundamental for professional and personal growth.

job1.description: Led the development of key features for a SaaS platform, mentored junior developers, and improved application performance by 20%. Worked extensively with Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
job1.task2: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements.
job1.task3: Conducted code reviews and maintained code quality standards.

job2.description: Developed and maintained websites and web applications for clients using React, Express, and MongoDB. Contributed to UI/UX design and optimized web performance.
job2.task1: Built responsive user interfaces with React and Tailwind CSS.
job2.task2: Developed RESTful APIs for various client projects.
job2.task3: Participated in agile development cycles and sprint planning.
job2.task4: Provided technical support and bug fixes for existing applications.

job3.description: Assisted in the development of an MVP for an innovative startup, focusing on front-end technologies and rapidly learning about the software development lifecycle.
job3.task1: Development of UI components with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
job3.task2: Collaboration with the design team to implement pixel-perfect interfaces.
job3.task4: Learning and application of agile methodologies.

csDegree.description: Focus on software development, algorithms, data structures, and artificial intelligence. Participated in research projects and developed an academic management system as a final project.
csDegree.highlight1: Final Course Project: Academic Management System with Grade A.

webDevCourse.description: Comprehensive technical training in front-end and back-end web development, interface design, databases, and computer networks.
webDevCourse.highlight1: Development of a local news portal as a practical project.
webDevCourse.highlight2: Award for best project of the 2017 class.

nextjsCert.description: Intensive course focused on best practices for Next.js development, including App Router, Server Components, and performance optimizations.

person1.name: Ana Silva
person1.comment: Working with Eduardo was a fantastic experience. His proactivity and technical knowledge were crucial to our project's success. Delivered everything on time and with exceptional quality!

person2.name: Carlos Oliveira
person2.comment: Eduardo not only developed our platform but also brought valuable insights that improved the final product. Highly recommend his services.

person3.name: Juliana Santos
person3.comment: Collaboration with Eduardo was very productive. He has a great ability to transform complex designs into functional and pleasant interfaces.

person4.name: Ricardo Mendes
person4.comment: Need a developer who understands the business and delivers robust solutions? Talk to Eduardo. He turned my idea into reality!

person5.name: Beatriz Costa
person5.comment: The automation Eduardo developed for our team saved hours of manual work. Efficient and very professional.

person6.name: Fernando Lima
person6.comment: Eduardo is a dedicated developer with great potential. Always willing to learn and face new challenges.

footer.name: Eduardo Almeida
